# Stream Deck Keybinds
# Generated by streamdeck-generator
#
# INSTRUCTIONS:
# 1. This file lists the keybinds expected by your Stream Deck profile.
# 2. You must ensure these keys are bound to the corresponding actions in WoW.
# 3. For "Universal" keys (Review "Universal Bar" assignments), bind them in Game Options.
# 4. For spell-specific keys, create macros or bind bar slots.

W                                                         -> Move Forward
S                                                         -> Move Backward
A                                                         -> Turn Left
D                                                         -> Turn Right
Q                                                         -> Strafe Left
E                                                         -> Strafe Right
Spacebar                                                  -> Jump/Swim Up
Num Lock                                                  -> Auto-Run
X                                                         -> Sit Down/Stand Up
Tab                                                       -> Target Nearest Enemy Tab
Shift + Tab                                               -> Target Previous Enemy
F1                                                        -> Target Nearest Friend
F2                                                        -> Target Friend 2
F3                                                        -> Target Friend 3
F4                                                        -> Target Friend 4
F5                                                        -> Target Friend 5
F1 (or sometimes just the assigned key if set in options) -> Target Self
Shift + F (Default setting for Interact Key as F          -> Target Focus
1                                                         -> Action Button 1
2                                                         -> Action Button 2
3                                                         -> Action Button 3
4                                                         -> Action Button 4
5                                                         -> Action Button 5
6                                                         -> Action Button 6
7                                                         -> Action Button 7
8                                                         -> Action Button 8
9                                                         -> Action Button 9
0                                                         -> Action Button 10
-                                                         -> Action Button 11
=                                                         -> Action Button 12
(Unbound by default                                       -> Extra Action Button 1
Esc                                                       -> Open Game Menu
C                                                         -> Character Info
P                                                         -> Spellbook & Abilities
B                                                         -> Inventory (Toggle All Bags)
L                                                         -> Quest Log
M                                                         -> World Map
Guild                                                     -> Social Panel (Friends
J                                                         -> Guild Panel (If separate)
K                                                         -> Professions Tab
Y                                                         -> Achievements
U                                                         -> Reputation Tab
I                                                         -> Dungeon & Raid Finder
H                                                         -> PvP Panel
Shift + J                                                 -> Adventure Guide
Enter                                                     -> Toggle Combat Log/Chat Entry
R                                                         -> Reply to Whisper
G                                                         -> Open Ping Wheel (Hold)
Print Screen                                              -> Screenshot
Shift + Mouse Wheel Down (Scroll Down)                    -> Toggle Action Bar Paging (Next Bar)
Shift + Mouse Wheel Up (Scroll Up)                        -> Toggle Action Bar Paging (Previous Bar)
F                                                         -> Interact Key
F6                                                        -> Divine Shield
F7                                                        -> Lay on Hands
F8                                                        -> Ardent Defender

F11                                                       -> Rebuke
F12                                                       -> War Stomp

B                                                         -> Open Bags

L                                                         -> Toggle Quest

NumPadMultiply                                            -> Pull Timer
NumPadSubtract                                            -> Focus Target
NumPadAdd                                                 -> Clear Focus
